concept.title: Data Rules and Alerts
concept.shortdesc: Data rules define the information that you want to see about the data moving between stages. You can create data rules based on any link in the pipeline. You can also create alerts based on the data rules.

conbody.p: When you click a link between two stages while monitoring a pipeline, the Monitoring panel displays summary statistics, data rules, and information about the stream of data that the link represents. The summary statistics that display are based on the data rules that you create.
To create a data rule, you need familiarity with the data being processed. You might monitor the pipeline or view a snapshot of data to help determine how to configure a data rule.
